Package bio.singa.mathematics.algorithms.voronoi.model

Class VoronoiHalfEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.mathematics.algorithms.voronoi.model.VoronoiHalfEdge
  • public class VoronoiHalfEdge
extends java.lang.Object
    Each edge can be represented by two directed opposed half edges. Each edge holds a reference to its original site event its corresponding edge and its angle.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double getAngle()
      Returns the angle in relation to the starting point of the edge.
      VoronoiEdge getEdge()
      The full edge corresponding to this edge.
      Vector2D getEndPoint()
      Returns the point where this edge ends.
      SiteEvent getSite()
      Returns the site associated to this half edge.
      Vector2D getStartPoint()
      Returns the point where this edge starts.
